最後咪又係繼續唔制裁相關人士,乜制裁行動都係對小市民最大力
始作俑者繼續馬照跑

又係制裁香港人嘅時候

1. 狗仇恨香港人變態以權謀私要制裁殺害香港人

2. 官同D考第一嘅又制裁香港人要震攝一下報下仇

3. 建制畜又要奶共爭功勞制裁香港人

4. 拍下籮柚走得遠遠果D又唔對準D制裁對象,要求外國一刀切用伊朗形式制裁全部香港人,殲滅香港,講嗰啲乜q重生？

5. 白人社會要對付ccp又要無差別制裁香港人

6. 芝麻又迷戀阿爺擬人法鍾意打仔教育,又要制裁

7. 鄉黑又被授權合法使用武力打柒香港人

8. 港共外國聯手唔比港人自由出入,dq旅行證件

做乜鳩？

replies.msg:
呢個情況用唔用vpn都一樣，係可有可無，除非你身處嘅國家唔俾你用twitter。

因為...

如果你用小米之類親政府電子產品，政府可以用backdoor睇你。(呢個時候就算用vpn都冇用)

又如果你個網絡供應商出賣你，佢都只係可以知道你上Twitter，而唔知你裡面內容，因為本身上網都加咗密。（咁用唔用vpn都得）

唯一出事嘅可能係Twitter 出賣你，爆你個ac有咩ip 登入紀錄，如果唔係都證明唔到個ac係你。（咁嘅情況下就要用vpn）
但問題係同樣地vpn provider 亦有可能會出賣你，佢都係有你嘅ip 同個人資料 或付款資訊等。
如果你用vpn，vpn公司有你資料；唔用，twitter就有你ip。兩者比較下，
我自己就寧願信Twitter 多過啲 要俾錢登記而又唔係好有信譽嘅vpn 公司。

https://youtu.be/FMScV1Mkaok

replies.msg:
中國有好多vpn一 share 出街，就有成堆人用，條ip出名就俾政府記住, 你直接連去嗰度，政府就知你翻牆。係睇幾時封咁解。

同埋你連去vpn一定係外國server, 你上去一個非主流嘅外國網不特止，重要流量有古怪就知你上緊個網唔簡單，因為你正常咁上一個網嘅流量冇可能太大，政府就知你連緊vpn，翻緊牆。

小弟如果講錯請高手指教。

replies.msg:
呢度咁講

https://tozny.com/blog/end-to-end-encryption-vs-https/

' Data is secure on your phone, it's secure in transit, and it's secure on your server. So it appears that data is always encrypted.'

'The reality of encryption in transit leaves out encryption of data at rest, which impact the security of both ends of the transmission.'

'This leaves you open to attack at 3 points of processing (the app, the load balancer, the server), 2 points of storage(mobile, server), and one point of transmission ( internal traffic).'

'If your server is the endpoint of your web API, but you have different services for processing, analysing, sharing, and backing -up your data, this just get worse.'

'You may be using HTTPS, but you can't really say that you're encrypting data.

With end-to-end encryption, it's secure at each point of process.'

呢度咁講

https://tozny.com/blog/end-to-end-encryption-vs-https/

' Data is secure on your phone, it's secure in transit, and it's secure on your server. So it appears that data is always encrypted.'

'The reality of encryption in transit leaves out encryption of data at rest, which impact the security of both ends of the transmission.'

'This leaves you open to attack at 3 points of processing (the app, the load balancer, the server), 2 points of storage(mobile, server), and one point of transmission ( internal traffic).'

'If your server is the endpoint of your web API, but you have different services for processing, analysing, sharing, and backing -up your data, this just get worse.'

'You may be using HTTPS, but you can't really say that you're encrypting data.

With end-to-end encryption, it's secure at each point of process.'

replies.msg:
咁都唔關vpn事…講緊data at rest

Standard “point to point” encryption doesn’t protect your data from your insiders like employees and vendors. They might intentionally misuse data or unintentionally leak it.

你vpn都係encrypt緊由你部機去到server條path (data in transit) 最多叫做spoof吓個ip source，但你要一次都無用過真ip登入否則理論上無額外安全到

quote.msg:
呢度咁講

https://tozny.com/blog/end-to-end-encryption-vs-https/

' Data is secure on your phone, it's secure in transit, and it's secure on your server. So it appears that data is always encrypted.'

'The reality of encryption in transit leaves out encryption of data at rest, which impact the security of both ends of the transmission.'

'This leaves you open to attack at 3 points of processing (the app, the load balancer, the server), 2 points of storage(mobile, server), and one point of transmission ( internal traffic).'

'If your server is the endpoint of your web API, but you have different services for processing, analysing, sharing, and backing -up your data, this just get worse.'

'You may be using HTTPS, but you can't really say that you're encrypting data.

With end-to-end encryption, it's secure at each point of process.'

咁都唔關vpn事…講緊data at rest

Standard “point to point” encryption doesn’t protect your data from your insiders like employees and vendors. They might intentionally misuse data or unintentionally leak it.

你vpn都係encrypt緊由你部機去到server條path (data in transit) 最多叫做spoof吓個ip source，但你要一次都無用過真ip登入否則理論上無額外安全到

即係其實要第一步就要用vpn有無理解錯
https://www.eff.org/deeplinks/2020/07/after-weeks-hack-it-past-time-twitter-end-end-encrypt-direct-messages


twitter自己話的vulnerable 無 end-to-endencrypted 好矛盾wor

replies.msg:
因為篇文章講緊dm, 唔係tweet
佢想講twitter staff唔應該可以access到dm內容本身（i.e. 應該得發送者同接收者decrypt到），而唔係講緊用戶身份
但你條tweet內容本身就係public，out of scope

Anyway開住無壞，但最好知道邊d位有用/邊d位vpn幫唔到
